content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-28, -61)
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61)
- Stone furnace at (-27, -59) with burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (1, -60)
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60)
- Stone furnace at (2, -56) with burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5)

### Smelting Array at (1, 1)
Two parallel smelting setups:
- Stone furnace at (1, 1) with burner inserter at (1.5, 2.5) and chest at (1.5, 3.5)
- Stone furnace at (3, 1) with burner inserter at (3.5, 2.5) and chest at (3.5, 3.5)

### Smelting Array at (2, 7)
Two parallel smelting setups:
- Stone furnace at (2, 7) with burner inserter at (2.5, 8.5) and chest at (2.5, 9.5)
- Stone furnace at (4, 7) with burner inserter at (4.5, 8.5) and chest at (4.5, 9.5)

### Copper Cable Production Line
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5)
- Input chest at (14.5, 11.5) with burner inserter at (14.5, 12.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 14.5) with burner inserter at (12.5, 14.5)

### Electronic Circuit Production Line
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5)
- Input chest at (21.5, 11.5) containing iron plates and copper cables
- Output chest at (24.5, 15.5) containing electronic circuits

### Power Generation Setup (Incomplete)
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)
- Additional offshore pumps at (2.5, 34.5) and (2.5, 36.5)
- Boiler at (18.0, 47.5)
- Steam engine at (29.5, 51.5)
- Multiple pipe groups attempting to connect water system

### Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various production facilities:
- Belt network from (5.5, 8.5) to (14.5, 4.5)
- Belt network from (2.5, 8.5) to (4.5, 8.5)
- Belt network from (4.5, 8.5) to (13.5, 10.5)
- Various other interconnecting belt groups

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors with fluid connections
- When connecting pipes, ensure each segment is properly connected to the next
- Break down long pipe connections into smaller segments
- Verify that pipe endpoints align with connection points of machines

### Power system errors
- Ensure power generation system (steam engine, boiler) is properly connected to water supply
- Complete the water pipeline system before expecting power generation

### Production line errors
- Ensure assembling machines have all required resources before expecting production
- Verify that inserters are properly positioned to reach their source and destination points

### Resource errors
- Keep burner mining drills fueled to maintain continuous operation
- Monitor furnace output capacity to prevent backup
